definitions.definition: Any material used to cover the top layer of soil to protect, insulate, or decorate it, or to discourage weeds or retain moisture .
examples: An organic mulch is a mulch made of natural substances such as leaves or grass clippings.

main_definition: ( agriculture , horticulture ) Any material used to cover the top layer of soil to protect, insulate, or decorate it, or to discourage weeds or retain moisture .
